[Emap B2B Restructures As Four Units; Separate Online Strategy For Each| paidContent:UK ](http://www.paidcontent.co.uk/entry/419-emap-b2b-restructures-as-four-units-separate-online-strategy-for-each/)
I find the idea of separating out the events business very odd – removing one path to making money from online brands seems very short-sighted.
